name: Horror Project
description:
This is a blockout project I created as a small private horror game. I used the "Horror Engine" Game kit of the UE4 marketplace.

As an officer, you will be transferred to a city where people have recently disappeared in an unexplained way. Some of the residents report paranormal activity. You are still motivated to reveal the secret, but you get quickly closer to it than you think ...

For more information please visit my website:

franziska-richter.net
